==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|駄|酒|落}}
{{wikipedia|Dajare}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|だじゃれ}}

# [[pun]] (a kind of words playing to make friendly atmosphere)

===Usage notes===
This spelling is orthographically wrong. The right form is only [[駄洒落]].
Some people write that way because of the similarity between 酒 and 洒.

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|ja|ダジャレ}} (most often used)
* {{l|ja|だじゃれ}}
* {{l|ja|駄洒落}} (the genuine form in kanji writing)
